Hello

My name is José Joaquín Atria and I’m a PhD student in Speech, Hearing and Phonetic Sciences at UCL. Here are some things that I’ve made.

Feel free to browse and use anything you might find of interest. If you want to contact me (please do!) you can find my contact information on my page at the UCL student directory. More detailed information can be found in my academic résumé.

Unless otherwise stated, all scripts and programs made available here by me are of my own creation and are released under the GNU General Public License. They are therefore Free Software. All other work is licensed under a Creative Commons By-NC-SA License.

This website uses Piwik for user tracking. See my privacy policy for information on how to opt-out, or for general peace of mind.

All code on this website has been lovingly crafted by hand. Just for you. ♥
